text: 2019 Final: MI vs CSK at Hyderabad. MI won by 1 run. Toss: MI chose bat.
2018 Final: CSK vs SRH at Wankhede. CSK won by 8 wickets. Toss: SRH chose bowl.
Wankhede Stadium: Batting friendly, avg 1st innings 175. Spin gets help later.
CSK vs MI head-to-head: MI leads 20-18 in 38 matches. Close rivalry.
Chinnaswamy: High scoring venue. Dew factor favors chasing team.
